name: Googly Eyefi
description:
Place Googly Eyes on your self and your friends in real time. The software automatically detects your face and places googly eyes over your eyes. Goof off with you friends and make sure to take and share your own pictures.

Googly Eyefi is a visual experience that demos what current computer vision is capible of on mobile.

This app has the intention to hopefully put some smiles on faces while inspiring and demenstrating the power of the opencv library on mobile.

More features to come
